backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles and CRUD logic for equipment, spare parts, cataloguing, maintenance, and documents with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark mode along with global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all app pages and wraps the UI with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable confirmation dialog component for delete and confirmation actions using shadcn AlertDialog.
Dropdown component fetching equipment list and allowing selection by equipment number.
Reusable form field wrapper that renders labels, inputs, help text, and validation errors.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes the backend actor using Internet Identity, handles authentication, and refreshes queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on equipment, spare parts, cataloguing records, maintenance data, and related backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and backgrounds.
frontend/src/lib/cataloguingTemplates.ts: Stores predefined cataloguing field templates by category and exposes a helper to retrieve template fields.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Provides helpers to convert bigint timestamps to formatted dates and date strings to bigint nanosecond values.
frontend/src/lib/exports.ts: Implements basic CSV and PDF export utilities using browser Blob and download links.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Contains simple validation helpers for required fields, numeric values, and email format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CataloguingPage.tsx: Implements the cataloguing record creation/editing UI with equipment selection, dynamic templates, and CRUD mutations.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: UI for uploading, viewing, editing, and deleting equipment documents with progress tracking and dialogs. Uses hooks to fetch and mutate document data tied to selected equipment.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentListPage.tsx: Displays all equipment with edit and delete actions, including dialogs and form handling for updating metadata. Fetches equipment list and performs update/delete mutations.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentMasterPage.t: Form page for creating new equipment records with validation and submit handling. Sends creation requests and resets fields on success.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: Manages maintenance records for selected equipment, including creation, editing, deletion, and status handling. Fetches maintenance list and opens dialogs for updates and confirmations.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Generates equipment, spare parts, and maintenance reports with options to export data to CSV or PDF. Fetches multiple datasets and formats them for export.
frontend/src/pages/SparePartsPage.tsx: Implements spare parts management UI with create, view-by-equipment, edit, and delete actions using React Query mutations and dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash-route support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, versioning, and the list of implemented features including edit/delete capabilities across modules.
